oai_dc:dc.dc:title: B. and P. W. Club presents radio to T. I. S. Girls, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the Business and Professional Women’s Club of Nashville, “which has sponsored a vocational guidance program with senior high school girls of Tennessee Industrial School for four years, presented the girls with a radio for their recreation room. A member of the club is seen above making the presentation.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Business and Professional Women’s Club (Nashville, Tenn.); Tennessee Industrial School (Nashville, Tenn.)
